name: Randomine
description:
In RandoMine, play as four would-be demigods and help them pay their debt for wrecking the Celestial Tavern.

Enjoy the vibrant, detailed pixel-art, and a cast of bizarre, lovable characters.



Dig, hack and blast your way through randomized caves filled with gems, monsters and treasure. Choose one of your heroes, each with their own unique abilities and advantages. Create your own tunnels and shafts to reach ore veins or to unearth hidden chambers. Use classic platforming mechanics to overcome trap-filled halls crawling with critters and collect rare artifacts.



Visit towns along the way to spend your hard earned resources and permanently upgrade your gear, making your heroes more resilient and powerful.



Always be on guard though. The caves bristle with a variety of creatures, from overgrown frogs and hornets to giant winged laser-shooting eyeballs. Various traps and turrets lurk in the corridors, waiting to undo your adventurers.



Traverse through three diverse biomes, each with different variations of enemies and events, each culminating in a peculiar miniboss.
  • Explore constantly shuffling levels that never cease to challenge and surprise
  • Solve carefully crafted puzzles to unlock rewards
  • Earn upgrades, expanding the capabilities of your crew
  • Craft your play with a choice of trinkets and curses before each level
